## Publications 

#### _Peer-reviewed journal articles_

```{r}

bib %>% 
  filter(groups == "article") %>% 
  mutate(ref = glue::glue(
    
    "{author} ({date}). {title}. _{journaltitle}_ {volume} ({number}): {pages}. DOI: {doi} <br><br>"
    
    )) %>% 
  select(date, ref) %>% 
  cv_kable(bib = TRUE)

```

#### _Book reviews_

```{r}

bib %>%
  filter(groups == "review") %>%
  mutate(ref = glue::glue(
    
    "{author} ({date}). {title}. _{journaltitle}_ {volume} ({number}): {pages}. DOI: {doi} <br><br>"
    
    )) %>% 
  select(date, ref) %>% 
  cv_kable(bib = TRUE)

```

#### _Technical reports_

```{r}

bib %>% 
  filter(groups == "report") %>% 
  mutate(ref = glue::glue(
    
    "{author} ({date}). {title}. {note}. <br><br>"
    
    )) %>% 
  select(date, ref) %>% 
  cv_kable(bib = TRUE)

```
